name: Space Rusher
description:
Are you checking for a new adventure? This Indie arcade game SpaceX is the new resolution of your boredom and the occasional trip to the bathroom. you don't need a Jetpack for action, just direct control the Rockets through the Space with your finger and prepare yourself for a crazy challenging action packed experience.
Features

• Over 50 unique levels or Endless Mode it depends on your choice
• Gems, diamonds and more gems
• Unlockable characters
• Motivational in-game messages
